### Radar plot of different site scores

Load generic libraries
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source('configuration.r')
```

Load specific libraries
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggradar)
```

```{r fig.height=8, fig.width=15}
dat <- read.table('../tables/site_scores.dat', check.names = F, sep=',', head=TRUE, row.names = 1)

plot.dat <- apply(dat, 2, function(x) (x-min(x))/(max(x)-min(x))) %>% 
  data.frame(check.names = F) %>% 
  rownames_to_column(var="group")
colnames(plot.dat) <- str_replace(colnames(plot.dat), ' Score', '')
plot.dat <- plot.dat[c(nrow(plot.dat), 1:(nrow(plot.dat)-1)), ]

ggradar(plot.dat[,], values.radar = c(0,0.5,1), grid.min=0, grid.max=1,  group.line.width = 1, group.point.size=6,
        grid.label.size=10, gridline.min.colour='black', gridline.max.colour='black',
        group.colours = pal_npg(c("nrc"))(10)[c(5,7,2,3,10,4,1)],
        background.circle.colour='white')

ggsave("../plots/figX_site_score_radar.png",  height=8, width=15) ## cannot save pdf due to font
```
